text: The men's coxless four competition at the 2019 World Rowing Championships took place at the Linz-Ottensheim regatta venue. A top-eight finish ensured qualification for the Tokyo Olympics. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Sunday 25 August 2019 || 11:56 || Heats |- | Tuesday 27 August 2019 || 10:00 || Repechages |- | Wednesday 28 August 2019 || 17:10 || Semifinals C/D |- | Thursday 29 August 2019 || 12:02 || Semifinals A/B |- | Friday 30 August 2019 || 09:50 || Final D |- | rowspan=3|Saturday 31 August 2019 || 10:25 || Final C |- | 12:00 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 14:42 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Heats=== Heat winners advanced directly to the A/B semifinals. The remaining boats were sent to the repechages. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Matthew Rossiter
